scripts.deploy: yarn run build && rimraf tmp && mkdir tmp && cp -R build/* tmp/ && cp -R build/* tmp/stage/ && ls tmp/stage/static/js/main* tmp/stage/index.html | xargs sed -i 's|/buildhub/|/buildhub/stage/|g' && ls tmp/stage/static/js/main* | xargs sed -i 's/buildhub.prod.mozaws.net/buildhub.stage.mozaws.net/' && gh-pages -d tmp --add && rimraf tmp
